definitions.title: adv. loc.
definitions.body: here, hither (prob. from the same demonst. √ found in f so, then (oft. in apod.), [[אַף]], [[אֵפוֹא]]: cf. Kö:ii. l, 247 f., 243, 331 f.):—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: Ge 19:12 [[עׂד מִי־לְְ]] [[פּׂה]] whom hast thou still here ? Ge 22:5 [[שְׁבוּ לָכֶם פּׂה]], Ge 40:15, Nu 22:8, Nu 32:16, De 5:28, De 12:8, Ju Jdg 4:20 [[הֲיֵשׁ פּׂה אִישׁ]], 2Ki 3:11, etc.; asked in some surprise, Ju Jdg 18:3 [[מַה־לְּ ְפׂה]] = what is thy business here ? simil. † 1Ki 19:9, 1Ki 19:13, Is 22:16, Is 52:5 [[וְעַתָּה מַה־לִּי־פׂה]]. Cf. the syn. [[בָּזֶה]], [[בּׂה]]

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[מִפּׂה]] or [[מִפּוֹ]], only Ez Eze 40–Eze 41, and always (exc. Eze 40:12 a, where it must be supplied with LXX SyrVer) repeated, on this side ... on that side (cf. [[מִזֶּה]] …[[מִזֶּה ]]), Ez Eze 40:10, Eze 40:10, Eze 40:12 b, Eze 40:12, Eze 40:21, Eze 40:21, etc.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: with the interrog. [[אֵי]], [[אֵיפׂה]] where ? v. p. 33. †
after a verb of motion, hither, 1Sa 16:11 [[עַד־בּאׁוֹ פׂה]], Ezr 4:2.
